#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int fact (int n)
{
	int j,s=1;
	for(j = n; j >=1; j--)
	{
		s = s*j;
	}
	return s;
}
int main()
{
	int t,i,s[11],k,count;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int h[101]={0};
		for(i=0;i<11;i++)
		cin>>s[i];
		cin>>k;
		count = 0;
		for(i=0;i<11;i++)
		h[s[i]]++;
		for(i=100;i>=0;i--)
		{
			if(h[i])
			count+= h[i];
			if(count >= k)
			break;	
		}
		if(count == k)
		printf("1\n");
		else
		printf("%d\n",fact(h[i])/(fact(count-k)*fact(h[i] - count + k)));
	}
	return 0;
}
